dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5080 IH: Landing Pass Extension Act of 2014
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Farenthold introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to extend the period of time for which a conditional permit to land temporarily may be granted to an alien crewman.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Landing Pass Extension Act of 2014.

section.header: Period of time for a conditional permit to land temporarily extended
section.text: Section 252(a)(1) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1282(a)(1)) is amended by striking (not exceeding twenty-nine days) and inserting (not exceeding 90 days).
